M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Assignment2
main entry of this assignment 2 demostration.
MainMenu - Class in <Unnamed>
The main menu of the store terminal This menu including following menu options:
Search elements in the store
Add a new item to store
Add a new gift to store
Sale item to customer
Redeem gift to customer
List all customers in store
List all items in store
List all gifts in store
Print out a store report including previous three
Quit the store terminal
MainMenu(Terminal) - Constructor for class MainMenu
Constructor for objects of class MainMenu
Menu - Class in <Unnamed>
Root class of all other menu classes
Menu(String, String, String, Terminal) - Constructor for class Menu
Constructor for objects of class Menu
Model - Class in <Unnamed>
Abstract class Model - the root of all other store components.
Model(Store) - Constructor for class Model
The only constructor to construct a object based on a Model class with given parent object.
ModelStackArray<T> - Class in <Unnamed>
A last in first out array container for model and derived classes.
This container can only handle a class derived from class Model
NOTE:This class requires the latest version of java runtime support.
ModelStackArray(int) - Constructor for class ModelStackArray
Constructor for objects of class ModelStackArray will construct a container in given maximum capacity.
ModelStackArray.Iterator - Class in <Unnamed>
The iterator class for this stack

name - Variable in class Store

NOTE:this method will return null if the index is not valid.

To append a new object to the stack at the top of it.
NOTE:The element which pushes in this container must be a class derived from Model.

routine() - Method in class Action
A abstract method interface will be called in each loop circle.
NOTE:It is very important to implement this method in each derived classes
routine() - Method in class CreateGiftAction
Create gift routine
This action might show fail to create a gift if there is one with the same name or out of space of gift container in the store
NOTE:This action is case sensitive
routine() - Method in class CreateItemAction
Create item routine This action might show fail to create an item if there is one with the same name or out of space of item container in the store
NOTE:This action is case sensitive
routine() - Method in class GenerateCustomerListAction
Routine to perform print customer detail action
routine() - Method in class GenerateGiftListAction

Routine to print out all store detail
routine() - Method in class RedeemGiftAction
Routine to interact with user to perform a redeem gift action
NOTE:This action is case sensitive
routine() - Method in class SaleItemAction
Routine to interact with user to perform a sale item action
NOTE:This action is case sensitive
routine() - Method in class SearchCustomerByNameAction
The action routine is to search a customer by its unique name and print found customer's detail for each loop circle.
THIS ACTION IS NOT CASE SENSITIVE!
routine() - Method in class SearchGiftByNameAction
This action routine is to search a gift by its unique name and print found gift's status.
THIS ACTION IS NOT CASE SENSITIVE!
routine() - Method in class SearchGiftsByPointsValueAction
Search routine
This action will find gifts under given points value and print out all found gifts' detail
routine() - Method in class SearchItemByNameAction
This action routine is to search an item by its unique name and print found item's status.
THIS ACTION IS NOT CASE SENSITIVE!
routine() - Method in class SearchItemsByPriceAction
This action privdes following range to choose.
1.
